edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.thesaurus
Class WordnetThesaurus

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.utils.IsCloseableObject
      edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.thesaurus.AbstractThesaurus
          edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.thesaurus.WordnetThesaurus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Thesaurus, IsCloseable, UsesLogger
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultThesaurus
public class WordnetThesaurus
extends AbstractThesaurus
implements Thesaurus

Implements a thesaurus using Wordnet.

This uses the Jaws interface to WordNet written by Brett Spell. See http://engr.smu.edu/~tspell/ for details.

getWordClassSynsetType

protected edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.SynsetType getWordClassSynsetType(java.lang.String wordClass)
Convert word class to Wordnet word synset type.

Parameters:
wordClass - Word class. May be one of noun, verb, adjective, adverb, or may be null.
Returns:
Wordnet synset type. null if wordclass unrecognized or word class was null.
